relation: $20,000 per research or clinical project (Conduct nursing research or clinical projects in bleeding disorders). 12-18 month term
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {72763=Villanova University was founded in 1842 by the Order of St. Augustine. To this day, Villanova’s Augustinian Catholic intellectual tradition is the cornerstone of an academic community in which students learn to think critically, act compassionately and succeed while serving others. There are more than 10,000 undergraduate, graduate and law students in the University’s six colleges., 76364=©1990 - 2015 Villanova University. All rights reserved.}

textAfterTable: How to Apply: Application at http://www.graduateprograms.com/pre-grad-registration/   Due Date: June 30, September 30 and December 31.   Title: ProofreadingServices.com Writing Scholarship   Sponsor: ProofreadingServices.com   Eligibility: Candidates must be an enrolled Senior in a U.S. High School or an Undergraduate or graduate enrolled in a U.S. College or University, (you do not have to be a U.S. Citizen); Minimum GPA 3.2   Award: Up to $500   How to Apply: Application online http://www.proofreadingservices.com/pages/scholarship-application   Due Date: June 25, 2015   Title: The SweatBlock "Social Confidence" Scholarship Sponsor: SweatBlock Eligibility: Must be a U.S. citizen; must be a full-time student (or planning to attend on a full-time basis) at an accredited institution of higher education;    Award: $2,000   How to Apply: Application online http://www.sweatblock.com/scholarship   Due Date: July 15, 2015
